svg.style: overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; touch-action: none; user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ROUTEUR R
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Router-on-a-Stick
Interface G0/0 (Trunk 802.1Q)
Subinterfaces:
• G0/0.10 - VLAN 10
IP: 192.168.10.1/24
ACL: USERS_IN (inbound)
• G0/0.20 - VLAN 20
IP: 192.168.20.1/24
ACL: SERVERS_IN (inbound)
• G0/0.30 - VLAN 30
IP: 192.168.30.1/24
ACL: ADMIN_IN (inbound)
Services:
• Serveur DHCP
- VLAN 10: .10-.250
- VLAN 20: .10-.250
- VLAN 30: .20-.250
- Bail: 7 jours
- Domaine: local.lan

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
SWITCH S1
━━━━━━━━━━━━
Management VLAN 30
IP: 192.168.30.11/24
GW: 192.168.30.1
Ports:
• Trunk vers R (802.1Q)
VLANs: 10, 20, 30
• Trunk vers S2 (802.1Q)
VLANs: 10, 20, 30
• Access VLAN 10 → m1
• Access VLAN 20 → m3

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
SWITCH S2
━━━━━━━━━━━━
Management VLAN 30
IP: 192.168.30.12/24
GW: 192.168.30.1
Ports:
• Trunk vers S1 (802.1Q)
VLANs: 10, 20, 30
• Trunk vers S3 (802.1Q)
VLANs: 10, 20, 30
• Access VLAN 10 → m2
• Access VLAN 20 → m4

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
SWITCH S3
━━━━━━━━━━━━
Management VLAN 30
IP: 192.168.30.13/24
GW: 192.168.30.1
Ports:
• Trunk vers S2 (802.1Q)
VLANs: 10, 20, 30
• Access VLAN 30 → m5
• Access VLAN 30 → m6

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
m1-user
━━━━━━━━
VLAN 10
IP: DHCP
Réseau: 192.168.10.0/24
GW: 192.168.10.1
Accès autorisé:
✓ ICMP vers VLAN 20
✓ HTTP (TCP/80) vers VLAN 20
✗ Autres flux vers VLAN 20
✗ Accès vers VLAN 30

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
m2-user
━━━━━━━━
VLAN 10
IP: DHCP
Réseau: 192.168.10.0/24
GW: 192.168.10.1
Accès autorisé:
✓ ICMP vers VLAN 20
✓ HTTP (TCP/80) vers VLAN 20
✗ Autres flux vers VLAN 20
✗ Accès vers VLAN 30

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
m3-serverhttp
━━━━━━━━━━━━
VLAN 20
IP: 192.168.20.10/24 (statique)
GW: 192.168.20.1
Services:
• Serveur HTTP (TCP/80)
Restrictions:
✗ Initiation flux vers VLAN 10
✓ Réponses TCP established
✓ ICMP echo-reply vers VLAN 10
✓ Trafic vers VLAN 30

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
m4-serverhttp
━━━━━━━━━━━━
VLAN 20
IP: 192.168.20.11/24 (statique)
GW: 192.168.20.1
Services:
• Serveur HTTP (TCP/80)
Restrictions:
✗ Initiation flux vers VLAN 10
✓ Réponses TCP established
✓ ICMP echo-reply vers VLAN 10
✓ Trafic vers VLAN 30

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
m5-admin
━━━━━━━━━
VLAN 30
IP: DHCP
Réseau: 192.168.30.0/24
GW: 192.168.30.1
Privilèges:
✓ Accès complet tous VLANs
✓ Gestion switches
✓ Gestion serveurs

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
m6-admin
━━━━━━━━━
VLAN 30
IP: DHCP
Réseau: 192.168.30.0/24
GW: 192.168.30.1
Privilèges:
✓ Accès complet tous VLANs
✓ Gestion switches
✓ Gestion serveurs
